messages.subject: Homeopathy: was  Big Bird, was Ned, etc
messages.messageBody:
<< Because I'm quite interested in what you have to say about homeopathy.
Tia >>

Hi Tia,

I've been having a lot of trouble with my mail program, so some messages
have been going
through and others haven't. I noticed my reply to your message didn't go
through, so I just wanted to say that if you ever have any questions (or
thoughts) about homeopathy, please don't hesitate to e-mail me privately:
bluelotus@...

The same goes for anybody on this list.


Yol (switching to a new e-mail program now!)

***********************************
When nothing is done, nothing is left
undone. The world is ruled by letting things take their course. It cannot be
ruled by interfering.
-- Tao Te Ching
***********************************
